title: Calories in a Watermelon Wedge
meta_description: Discover calories in watermelon wedge, including carbs, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Fresh seedless watermelon; 1 wedge ≈286g (1/8 of medium 10-inch diameter melon, rind removed).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by watermelon variety, ripeness, size, and portioning method. Values are averages; check for specifics if needed.

quick_answer.text: A typical watermelon wedge provides about 86 calories, mainly from natural sugars with high water content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a watermelon wedge?
faqs.a: About 86 calories for a standard 286 g wedge.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a watermelon wedge?
faqs.a: Approximately 21.6 g carbs, including 17.7 g natural sugars and 1.1 g fiber.
Yes, at just 30 kcal per 100 g, it's a hydrating, low-calorie fruit.

faqs.q: How much protein is in watermelon?
faqs.a: Only about 1.7 g per wedge, as it's not a significant protein source.

faqs.q: Does the size of the wedge affect calories?
faqs.a: Yes, larger wedges have more calories; adjust based on actual weight (≈30 kcal per 100 g).
